title: Group Leaders can manually allocate a single ticket successfully
custom_steps:
Given I login as a verified patron with tickets
And I am navigated to the Events Page
And I click the "Invite People" button for an event
And I am navigated to the ticket details page
When I click the manual allocation button on an unassigned seat
Then a modal will appear for manual allocation with all the correct information
When I enter values for name and email correctly
And I click the save button
Then an assigned badge will be placed for that seat with all the recipient information just provided

title: Group Leaders can self-assign seats with Manual Allocation successfully
custom_steps:
Given I login as a verified patron with tickets
And I am navigated to the Events Page
And I click the "Invite People" button for an event
And I am navigated to the ticket details page
When I click the manual allocation button on an unassigned seat
Then a modal will appear for manual allocation with all the correct information
When I enter values for name and email for the logged-in user
And I click the save button
Then an assigned badge and a self badge will be placed for that seat with all the recipient information just provided

title: Group Leaders can trigger error validation for "no name" in Manual Allocation
custom_steps:
Given I login as a verified patron with tickets
And I click the "Invite People" button for an event
And I click the manual allocation button on an unassigned seat
When I enter no value in the name field
And I enter a correct value for the email field
And I click save recipient
Then error validation will trigger, indicating Required field under the name field

title: Group Leaders can trigger error validation for "no email" in Manual Allocation
custom_steps:
Given I login as a verified patron with tickets
And I click the "Invite People" button for an event
And I click the manual allocation button on an unassigned seat
When I enter a value in the name field
And I enter no value for the email field
And I click save recipient
Then error validation will trigger, indicating Required field under the email field

title: Group Leaders can trigger error validation for "incorrect email" in Manual Allocation
custom_steps:
Given I login as a verified patron with tickets
And I click the "Invite People" button for an event
And I click the manual allocation button on an unassigned seat
When I enter a value in the name field
And I enter an invalid value for the email field
And I click save recipient
Then error validation will trigger, indicating "Email address is invalid" under the email field

title: Group Leaders can close the Manual Allocation modal successfully
custom_steps:
Given I login as a verified patron with tickets
And I am navigated to the Events Page
And I click the "Invite People" button for an event
And I am navigated to the ticket details page
And I click the manual allocation button on a seat
When I click the x button
Or I press the ESC key
Or I click outside the modal
Then the modal will close
And no new data will be saved

title: Group Leaders can change their manual assignment from self- assigned to non self-assigned
custom_steps:
Given I login as a verified patron with tickets
And I click the "Invite People" button for an event
And I click the manual allocation button on an unassigned seat
And I assign the seat using the email address of the logged-in User (Self)
And a self badge is displayed on the above the seat number
When I click the edit manual allocation button (Pencil Icon)
And I change the email address to a verified patron other than the logged-in user (non-self)
Then the self badge removes from the seat

title: Group Leaders can change their manual assignment from non self- assigned to self-assigned
custom_steps:
Given I login as a verified patron with tickets
And I click the "Invite People" button for an event
And I click the manual allocation button on an unassigned seat
And I assign the seat using the email address to a verified patron other than the logged-in user (non-self)
And a self badge is not displayed above the seat number
When I click the edit manual allocation button (Pencil Icon)
And I change the email address of the logged-in User (Self)
Then the self badge is displayed in the seat

title: Group Leaders will trigger Error validation when they don't provide a name in the Manual Allocation Edit Seat modal
custom_steps:
Given I login as a verified patron with tickets
And I click the "Invite People" button for an event
And I click the pencil icon on a manually assigned seat
And I click the Edit seat button on the manually assigned seat
When I erase the name value in the Name field
And I click save changes
Then a red outline will be placed around the name field
And a message "Required field" will be placed below the Name field 
When I enter a value into the Name field
And I click save Assigned Ticket
Then the modal will close and the seat will allocated

title: Group Leaders will trigger Error Validation when they don't provide a correctly formatted email
custom_steps:
Given I login as a verified patron with tickets with manually assigned seats
And I click the "Invite People" button for an event
And I click the pencil icon on a manually assigned seat
And I click the Edit seat button on the manually assigned seat
When I change the email value to one without a correct format, in the Email field
And I click save changes
Then a red outline will be placed around the name field
And a message "Email address is invalid" will be displayed below the email field
When I enter a correctly formatted email in the email field
And I click Save Changes
Then the modal will close and the seat will allocated

title: Group Leaders will trigger error validation when they don't provide any email
custom_steps:
Given I login as a verified patron with tickets with manually assigned seats
And I click the "Invite People" button for an event
And I click the pencil icon on a manually assigned seat
And I click the Edit seat button on a manually assigned seat
When I erase the email value in the Email field
And I click Save Changes
Then a red outline will be placed around the name field
And a message "Required field" will be displayed below the email field
When I enter a correctly formatted email in the email field
And I click Save Changes
Then the modal will close and the seat will allocated

title: Group leaders are able to close the Edit seat modal
custom_steps:
Given I login as a verified patron with tickets
And I click the "Invite People" button for an event
And I click the pencil icon on a manually assigned seat
And I click the Edit seat button on the manually assigned seat
When I make changes to the name and email values
And I click outside the modal
Or I click the x button on the modal
Then the modal will close
And the changes will not be saved

title: Group Leaders are able to remove allocation of a manually assigned recipient via the edit seat modal
custom_steps:
Given I login as a verified patron with tickets
And I click the "Invite People" button for an event
And I click the pencil icon on a manually assigned seat
And I click the Edit seat button on the manually assigned seat
When I Click the Remove Recipient button
Then the modal will close
And the seat will be un-allocated
